## Problem 1 

### Part 1 

Load Instacart dataset.

```{r load_data}
data("instacart")
```

“The Instacart Online Grocery Shopping Dataset 2017” is an anonymized dataset with `r nrow(instacart)` observations and `r ncol(instacart)` columns. The variable names are `r names(instacart)`. These include names as character variables, and other numeric variables. Key information of interest are products, aisles (contains categorized products) and department (contains categorized aisles).
